description: Associates a set of tags with a specified resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the resource with the tags to be listed.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A set of key-value pairs that are used to manage the resource. (dict) --- A set of key-value pairs that are used to manage the resource. Tags can only be applied to permission sets and cannot be applied to corresponding roles that IAM Identity Center creates in Amazon Web Services accounts. The key for the tag. The value of the tag.
